overview_of_class:
Quantum mechanics, electronic structure, periodic properties of the elements, chemical bonding, thermodynamics, gas laws, intermolecular forces, properties of solids and liquids, special topics in modern chemistry. Must be taken concurrently with the Chem 161-0 laboratory course.

Prerequisite: Permission of the Chemistry Department by placement exam.
Please contact Dr. Fred Northrup at f-northrup@northwestern.edu for more information.
name: Accelerated General Chemistry 1
title: WCAS CHEM 151-0-01 Accelerated General Chemistry 1
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for CHEM 161-0. Add both classes (CHEM 161-0 & 151-0) to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required

Please contact Dr. Fred Northrup at f-northrup@northwestern.edu for more information.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Permission of the Chemistry Department by placement exam.
Please contact Dr. Fred Northrup at f-northrup@northwestern.edu for more information.

Must be taken concurrently with the Chem 161-0 laboratory course.
Enrollment in 10AM Chem 151-0 requires enrollment in 10AM Chem 161-0.
